sec.p: DNA sequences have been deposited at GenBank under accession numbers KF616865 – KF617193 for the mitochondrial control region and under numbers KF617194 – KF617224 for the Clock poly-Q alleles; sequence alignments, microsatellite data and Clock gene data available from the Dryad Digital Repository: http://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.6dc6k.
